about_the_game:
NothingDOG-《We are the world》-Public welfare soundtrack album

About this:


NothingDOG has traveled through countless time and space, but this is the only world without peace. NothingDOG wants to find clear water and soft bread, and the NothingDOG wants to see people on the road full of laughter. NothingDOG enters our dreams for this purpose, allowing the frequency of love to resonate with our heartbeat, allowing us to witness together: “Peace is happening.”


NothingDOG-《We are the world》-Public welfare soundtrack album to bring x new dogs, May we on this earth sing and circle with the dogs, may we remember our identity, and may peace always be there!


-New DLC dogs
-DLC Pure Music Enjoyments
-NothingDOG's Blessing


-100% of the revenue from this DLC will be donated to "World Peace" related public welfare through authoritative charitable organizations.
